faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Quick answers to common questions about our services and process.

items.question: How long does a typical project take?
items.answer: Project timelines vary depending on complexity and scope. Simple websites typically take 2-4 weeks, while complex web applications can take 8-16 weeks. We'll provide a detailed timeline during our initial consultation.

items.question: What is your development process?
items.answer: We follow an agile development process with regular updates and feedback loops. This includes discovery, planning, design, development, testing, and launch phases with continuous client involvement.

items.question: Do you provide ongoing maintenance and support?
items.answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive maintenance and support packages to keep your website or application running smoothly, secure, and up-to-date with the latest technologies.

items.question: What technologies do you specialize in?
items.answer: We specialize in modern web technologies including React, Next.js, Node.js, TypeScript, and cloud platforms like AWS. For mobile development, we use React Native and Flutter.

items.question: Can you work with my existing team or systems?
items.answer: Absolutely! We're experienced in collaborating with existing teams and integrating with current systems. We can work as an extension of your team or provide guidance to your internal developers.

items.question: How do you handle project communication?
items.answer: We maintain transparent communication through regular video calls, project management tools, and detailed progress reports. You'll always know the status of your project and have direct access to the development team.

items.question: What makes RapidBizz different from other agencies?
items.answer: Our combination of technical expertise, business understanding, and client-focused approach sets us apart. We don't just build products; we create solutions that drive real business results.

items.question: Do you work with startups or only established companies?
items.answer: We work with businesses of all sizes, from early-stage startups to large enterprises. We tailor our approach and pricing to match your current stage and growth objectives.

officeHours.title: Office Hours
officeHours.note: We're available for emergency support 24/7 for existing clients.

socialLinks.title: Follow Us
